tutorials.continueBBTutorial: Para Alpha, hemos configurado una cuenta de prueba para que la uses. Accede a trav茅s de la configuraci贸n haciendo clic en el bot贸n "conectar tu cuenta". Selecciona cualquier instituci贸n bancaria e ingresa "user_good" y "password_good" como contrase帽a cuando se te solicite. Ingresa "1111" para el c贸digo MFA y selecciona las cuentas bancarias que desees vincular. Acepta los t茅rminos y condiciones. signup_login.features-title: Bringing you the best in mind
signup_login.features-description: Money saved, tracked, and seen in one easy to use platform by using a wide variety of tools to better control your finances
signup_login.feature2-description: Take a look of what subscriptions get in the habit of spending your money with our recurring costs widget.
signup_login.feature1-title: Everything Is Only a Keypress Away
signup_login.feature1-description: With BreadBox, linking your accounts is done once to see plenty. Avoid having to use multiple banking apps to understand your expenses.
signup_login.feature3-title: The world of finances made easy.
signup_login.feature3-description: Familiarizng yourself with your investments should be as easy as spending money in your brokerage account. Take advantage of our powerful visualization tools to better grasp how your money is working.
